title: Heartwarming Christmas feast awaits at Maria's SteakCafe
text:
Celebrate the joy of Christmas with Maria’s SteakCafe’s festive dine-in and delivery menus featuring timeless holiday favourites.
This Christmas, Maria’s SteakCafe invites you to rediscover the joy of togetherness through a feast that warms the heart and celebrates the season’s finest flavours. Renowned for its exceptional steaks and heartfelt hospitality, Maria’s is bringing back the festive magic with a specially curated Christmas Menu that embodies comfort, craftsmanship, and cheer.
From the first bite to the last, every dish tells a story of tradition and care—transforming each meal into a memorable moment shared with loved ones.
A taste of home this Christmas
There’s something truly special about Christmas at Maria’s SteakCafe, where every dish is made with heart and every meal feels like home. This year’s festive menu brings back comforting classics such as Angus Beef Wellington, Roast Turkey, and Roast Lamb, paired perfectly with nostalgic favourites like Bread and Butter Pudding.
It’s a spread that warms the soul, fills the table with comfort, and captures the essence of Christmas—the joy of sharing.
Christmas delivery menu | Available November 21 2025 – January 4 2026
Designed for gatherings of five, Maria’s SteakCafe Christmas Delivery Menu starts from RM780+, featuring six festive sets to choose from. Each set highlights Maria’s signature mains, including:
- Wagyu MB7 or Black Angus MB3 Tomahawk
- Angus Beef Wellington (with or without Foie Gras)
- Roast Lamb
- Roast Turkey
These come complete with comforting sides such as Caesar Salad, Spaghetti Chicken Bolognese, Roasted Potatoes, Creamed Spinach, and the all-time favourite Bread & Butter Pudding.
For an extra touch of indulgence, add-on options like Sea-Caught Tiger Prawns or New Zealand Lamb Cutlets are available—perfect for elevating your festive feast.
Maria’s À La Carte Delivery Menu is also available throughout the season (21 November 2025 – 4 January 2026), with prices ranging from RM340+ to RM1,380+. Choose from a variety of centrepiece dishes including the Angus Beef Wellington, Classic Roast Turkey, Roast Lamb, or Wagyu Tomahawk—each beautifully presented in a festive gift box.
Whether you’re gifting a loved one or hosting an intimate celebration, Maria’s brings the joy of giving straight to your home.
*Pre-orders are required at least one week in advance.
Christmas dine-in menu | Available December 24-25 2025 only
For those who wish to celebrate the season surrounded by the warmth of Maria’s hospitality, the Dine-In Christmas Menu offers a nostalgic yet elevated dining experience.
Your festive journey begins with a Pan-Seared Scallop with Tomato and Olive Salsa, followed by a comforting Roasted Pumpkin Soup. For the main course, guests may select from a variety of exquisite cuts, including:
- Australian Wagyu MB7 Tomahawk
- MB7–MB9 Ribeye
- Angus Beef Wellington with Foie Gras
- Japanese Wagyu A5 Miyazaki
- Japanese Kobe A5
- Korean MiGyeongSan Hanwoo 1++
Non-beef lovers can delight in New Zealand Lamb Cutlet, Grilled Salmon Fillet, Atlantic White Cod, Lobster Thermidor, or the timeless Roast Turkey. The experience concludes on a sweet note with Maria’s signature Bread & Butter Pudding.
The Christmas Dine-In Set is priced from RM130++, available exclusively on Christmas Eve and Christmas Day. As seats are limited, early reservations are highly encouraged.
Special Festive Promotion
Celebrate early and enjoy exclusive savings with Maria’s SteakCafe’s early bird promotions!
Receive a 10% discount on all pre-orders for both delivery and dine-in menus:
- Delivery Menu Early Bird promotion ends November 23 2025
- Dine-In Menu Early Bird promotion ends December 11 2025
Plan your festive gatherings ahead for a seamless, joy-filled celebration with Maria’s.
Celebrate Christmas, Maria’s Way
This festive season, let Maria’s SteakCafe be part of your Christmas story—where every dish is prepared with passion, every table feels like home, and every moment is shared with love.
Available at all Maria’s SteakCafe outlets across the Klang Valley. For more information or reservations, visit www.marias.com.my or contact +6017 902 0339.
